definitions.text: poisonous drug derived from an Eurasian plant of the genus Conium
examples: Socrates refused to flee and died by drinking hemlock

definitions.text: large branching biennial herb native to Eurasia and Africa and adventive in North America having large fernlike leaves and white flowers; usually found in damp habitats; all parts extremely poisonous
soft coarse splintery wood of a hemlock tree especially the western hemlock
